languages.text: Персонаж с рукопашным оружием в руках создает вокруг себя область угрозы. Эта область включает все клетки, которые персонаж может потенциально атаковать этим оружием. Противник, находящийся в области угрозы или покидающий ее, может спровоцировать атаку по нему рукопашным оружием. Такая атака называется атакой по возможности.

A character wielding a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon creates a threatened area around them. This area includes all cells the character can reach with this weapon. Actions of an enemy within this threatened area or one who attempts to leave it may provoke an attack with this melee weapon. Such attacks are called attacks of opportunity.
languages.original_text: Персонаж с рукопашным оружием в руках создает вокруг себя область угрозы. Эта область включает все клетки, которые персонаж может потенциально атаковать этим оружием. Противник, находящийся в области угрозы или покидающий ее, может спровоцировать атаку по нему рукопашным оружием. Такая атака называется атакой по возможности.

traits.locale_text: A character wielding a melee weapon creates a threatened area around them. This area includes all cells the character can reach with this weapon. An enemy within this threatened area or one who attempts to leave it may provoke an attack with this melee weapon. Such attacks are called attacks of opportunity.

A character wielding a melee weapon creates a threatened area around them. This area includes all cells the character can reach with this weapon. An enemy within this threatened area or one who attempts to leave it may provoke an attack with this melee weapon. Such attacks are called attacks of opportunity.

A character wielding a melee weapon creates a threatened area around them. This area includes all cells the character can reach with this weapon. Actions of an enemy within this threatened area or one who attempts to leave it may provoke an attack with this melee weapon. Such attacks are called attacks of opportunity.

A character wielding a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon creates a threatened area around them. This area includes all cells the character can reach with this weapon. Actions of an enemy within this threatened area or one who attempts to leave it may provoke an attack with this melee weapon. Such attacks are called attacks of opportunity.

A character wielding a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon creates a threatened area around them. This area includes all cells the character can reach with this weapon. Actions of an enemy within this threatened area or one who attempts to leave it may provoke an attack with this melee weapon. Such attacks are called attacks of opportunity.

languages.text: Ein Charakter mit einer {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfwaffe{/g} erschafft einen bedrohten Bereich um sich herum. Dieser Bereich umfasst alle Felder, die der Charakter mit seiner Waffe erreichen kann. Feindliche Aktionen innerhalb dieses bedrohten Bereichs sowie der Versuch eines Feindes, ihn zu verlassen, können einen Angriff mit dieser Nahkampfwaffe provozieren. Solche Angriffe nennt man Gelegenheitsangriffe.
languages.original_text: A character wielding a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon creates a threatened area around them. This area includes all cells the character can reach with this weapon. Actions of an enemy within this threatened area or one who attempts to leave it may provoke an attack with this melee weapon. Such attacks are called attacks of opportunity.

traits.locale_text: Ein Charakter mit einer Nahkampfwaffe erschafft einen bedrohten Bereich um sich herum. Dieser Bereich umfasst alle Zellen, die der Charakter mit seiner Waffe erreichen kann. Feindliche Aktionen innerhalb dieses bedrohten Bereichs sowie der Versuch eines Feindes, ihn zu verlassen, können einen Angriff mit dieser Nahkampfwaffe provozieren. Solche Angriffe nennt man {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g}.

languages.text: Muni d'une arme de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g}, un personnage crée une zone menacée autour de lui. Cette zone couvre toutes les cases qu'il peut atteindre avec cette arme. Les actions d'un ennemi qui se trouve dans cette zone menacée ou tente d'en sortir peuvent déclencher une attaque avec cette arme de mêlée. De telles attaques sont appelées « attaques d'opportunité ».
languages.original_text: A character wielding a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon creates a threatened area around them. This area includes all cells the character can reach with this weapon. Actions of an enemy within this threatened area or one who attempts to leave it may provoke an attack with this melee weapon. Such attacks are called attacks of opportunity.

traits.locale_text: Muni d'une arme de mêlée, un personnage crée une zone menacée autour de lui. Cette zone couvre toutes les cases que le personnage peut atteindre avec cette arme. Les actions d'un ennemi qui se trouve dans cette zone menacée ou tente d'en sortir peuvent déclencher une attaque avec cette arme de mêlée. De telles attaques sont appelées {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attaques d'opportunité{/g}.

languages.text: 使用{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}武器的角色，周围会有一片威胁区域。威胁区域涵盖该角色使用该武器可以攻击到的所有区域。 当敌人在威胁区域内采取部分行动，或试图离开威胁区域时，会引发该角色使用近战武器进行攻击。这样的攻击称之为借机攻击。
languages.original_text: A character wielding a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon creates a threatened area around them. This area includes all cells the character can reach with this weapon. Actions of an enemy within this threatened area or one who attempts to leave it may provoke an attack with this melee weapon. Such attacks are called attacks of opportunity.

traits.locale_text: 使用近战武器的角色，周围会有一片威胁区域。威胁区域涵盖该角色使用该武器可以攻击到的所有区域。 当敌人在威胁区域内采取部分行动，或试图离开威胁区域时，会引发该角色使用近战武器进行攻击。这样的攻击称之为{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}借机攻击{/g}。

languages.text: Los personajes que blandan armas {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} crean un área de peligro a su alrededor. Esta área incluye todas las casillas a las que puedan llegar los personajes con dicho tipo de armas. Las acciones de un enemigo situado dentro de esta área de peligro u otro que intente salir de ella pueden conllevar a un ataque con el arma cuerpo a cuerpo. Esta clase de ataques reciben el nombre de ataques de oportunidad.
languages.original_text: A character wielding a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon creates a threatened area around them. This area includes all cells the character can reach with this weapon. Actions of an enemy within this threatened area or one who attempts to leave it may provoke an attack with this melee weapon. Such attacks are called attacks of opportunity.

traits.locale_text: Los personajes que blandan armas cuerpo a cuerpo crean un área de peligro a su alrededor. Esta área incluye todas las casillas a las que puedan llegar los personajes con dicho tipo de armas. Las acciones de un enemigo situado dentro de esta área de peligro u otro que intente salir de ella pueden conllevar a un ataque con el arma cuerpo a cuerpo. Esta clase de ataques reciben el nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}ataques de oportunidad{/g}.

languages.original_text: A character with a melee weapon in hand creates a threat area around him. This area includes all squares that the character can potentially attack with that weapon. An enemy in or entering the threat zone can provoke a melee attack against it. Such an attack is called an opportunity attack.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}武器を使用するキャラクターはキャラクター自身の周囲に脅威エリアを作りだす。このエリアはそのキャラクターが武器を使用して届く範囲のセルを含む。 この脅威エリア内の敵あるいはエリアから出ようとする者のアクションはこの近接武器の攻撃を誘発する可能性がある。このような攻撃を機会攻撃と呼ぶ。
languages.original_text: A character wielding a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon creates a threatened area around them. This area includes all cells the character can reach with this weapon. Actions of an enemy within this threatened area or one who attempts to leave it may provoke an attack with this melee weapon. Such attacks are called attacks of opportunity.

traits.locale_text: 近接武器を使用するキャラクターはキャラクター自身の周囲に脅威エリアを生成する。そのエリアにはそのキャラクターが武器を使用して届く範囲のセルが含まれる。 脅威エリア内の敵あるいはエリアから脱出しようとする者のアクションにより、近接武器の攻撃が誘発される可能性がある。これが{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}機会攻撃{/g}となる。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Yakın dövüş{/g} silahı kullanan bir karakter, çevresinde bir tehdit alanı oluşturur. Bu alan, karakterin mevcut silahıyla ulaşabileceği tüm hücreleri içerir. Bu tehdit alanı içindeki bir düşmanın eylemleri veya bu alandan çıkmaya çalışması, bu yakın dövüş silahıyla yapılacak bir saldırıyı tetikleyebilir. Bu tarz saldırılara fırsat saldırıları adı verilir.
languages.original_text: A character wielding a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon creates a threatened area around them. This area includes all cells the character can reach with this weapon. Actions of an enemy within this threatened area or one who attempts to leave it may provoke an attack with this melee weapon. Such attacks are called attacks of opportunity.
